statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' AND reading_time >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading_time = TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE location IS NOT NULL
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value < 50 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SensorAnalytics WHERE analytics_id = 1
DELETE FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
DELETE FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_value < 10
DELETE FROM SensorAnalytics WHERE anomaly_score > 0.8
DELETE FROM SensorAlerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2021-06-01'
DELETE FROM SensorAlerts WHERE message LIKE '%critical%' AND timestamp > '2021-07-01'
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
DELETE FROM sensor_logs WHERE log_id = 100;
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 2;
